title: Add branch info for git submodule
body: Because master is not default branch and doesn't exist. So we need to explicitly specify branch information.

comments.author: mikekinsman
comments.body:
### :white_check_mark: Validation status: passed


File | Status | Preview URL | Details
---- | ------ | ----------- | -------
[.gitmodules](https://github.com/fenxu/SkiaSharp/blob/master/.gitmodules) | :white_check_mark:Succeeded | |

For more details, please refer to the [build report](https://opbuildstorageprod.blob.core.windows.net/report/2018%5C6%5C19%5C81ca5486-8c50-0a94-05c4-486e23e99ecf%5CPullRequest%5C201806190738362517-556%5Cworkflow_report.html?sv=2015-02-21&sr=b&sig=zc19obG7RmCERBjKREmPeFfhSQy9VTPaO7oYv08%2FCNE%3D&st=2018-06-19T07%3A35%3A59Z&se=2018-07-20T07%3A40%3A59Z&sp=r).

**Note:** If you changed an existing file name or deleted a file, broken links in other files to the deleted or renamed file are listed only in the full build report.

comments.author: joelmartinez
comments.body: @mattleibow this is related to the OPS onboarding for the API docs ... the system apparently needs to check out all submodules (probably just as a generic process), and it was failing because there's no default branch info, and mono/skia doesn't have a `master` branch. Adding this default branch to the submodule config works around the issue ... though please let us know if that's the correct branch to use as the default.
